meanings.definition: Not timely; happening or done at a time that is not suitable or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: The untimelier rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: Her untimelier arrival caused a delay in the meeting.
meanings.sent3: It was untimelier for the sun to hide behind the clouds during the eclipse.
meanings.sent4: The untimelier traffic turned the highway into a parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The untimelier alarm clock made him late for work.

meanings.sent1: The untimelier announcement interrupted the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: His untimelier joke offended some of the audience.
meanings.sent3: It was untimelier for the fire alarm to go off during the quiet exam.
meanings.sent4: The untimelier thunderstorm disrupted the outdoor wedding.
meanings.sent5: The untimelier phone call came in the middle of an important conversation.
